sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>triceratops</radical> with a <radical>moon</radical> <radical>knife</radical> can <kanji>whittle down</kanji> anything.
meaningInfo: Imagine the triceratops with its little moon knife, doing some whittling. Hand it anything and it will whittle it down.
readingMnemonic: Everything it will <kanji>whittle down</kanji> shall be put in a <reading>sack</reading> (<ja>さく</ja>).
readingInfo: Check out the sack that holds all the things that the triceratops whittled down. Go ahead and look through it, it's quite filled.
